response.original_title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & His Friends Help Out
response.overview: All Aboard! According to Sir Topham Hatt, "Helping out is one of the best ways to show that you're a Really Useful Engine." That's why it's so important for Thomas to race to the rescue when one of this friends needs a "helping hand", or in Thomas' case, a "helping buffer". This special collection of stories highlights your Sodor Friends proving that sometimes friendship is stronger than fear as they help those in need.
response.title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & His Friends Help Out
